name: Stay On Target
description:
Stay On Target

an Outer Space Adventure by Roe

Z/N - Fire
Arrow Keys - Fly

Your spaceship's targeting systems have been disabled, and now the enemy's mines are floating toward the rest of the fleet. As the lone fighter, it's up to you to stop as many as you can.

Each mine shot down adds 100 points to your score, but each mine that slips through subtracts 100 points from your score. Let your score drop to -1000 or get hit 3 times, and it's game over! Oh no!

Simple prototype to see if this kind of limiting play is enjoyable; here's hoping it is!
